articles.author: Pranshu Verma
articles.title: Trump says India will stop buying Russian oil. New Delhi won’t confirm. - The Washington Post
articles.description: President Donald Trump said Prime Minister Narendra Modi had promised that India would stop buying Russian oil. However, India said it was “not aware” Trump and Modi had spoken at all.
articles.content: NEW DELHI Indian officials said Thursday that they were not aware of any conversation between President Donald Trump and Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Wednesday, appearing to counter a claim… [+60 chars]
